mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (BOARD_NO, ZONE_NO, INFO_NO, CATEGORY, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_WRITER) VALUES (SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL,#{zoneNo},SEQ_INO.NEXTVAL,2,#{boardTitle},#{boardContent},#{boardWriter})

INSERT INTO INFO (INFO_NO, BOARD_NO, ZONE_NO, INFO_ADDRESS, INFO_TIME, INFO_HOMEPAGE, INFO_CALL, INFO_TYPE) VALUES(SEQ_INO.CURRVAL, SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL, #{zoneNo}, #{infoAddress}, #{infoTime}, #{infoHomepage}, #{infoCall}, 3)
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT(FILE_NO, BOARD_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_LEVEL) VALUES(SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL,#{originName},#{changeName},#{filePath},#{fileLevel})

INSERT INTO FESTIVAL(BOARD_NO, ZONE_NO, INFO_NO, START_DATE, END_DATE, FES_CATEGORY, FES_MONEY) VALUES(SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL, #{zoneNo}, SEQ_INO.CURRVAL, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{fesCategory}, #{fesMoney})
